#include<stdio.h>
int main(){
    int t,i,n,flag;
    long long int s,e,x,y;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
       scanf("%lld %lld",&s,&e);
       scanf("%d",&n);
       flag=0;
       for(i=0;i<n;++i){
           scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y);
           if(x>=e||y<=s)
              continue;
           else
              flag=1;
       }
       if(flag==0)
          printf("YES\n");
       else
          printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
